attributes.review: I downloaded the app in hopes of getting to know the bunker boy better. But it just made my phone die really fast and then to top it off I think this app could be classified as  Chinese spy wear. After I downloaded it weird things kept popping up about Donald trump being a good president and I just don’t see how that could be true. Definitely a horrible app just like the person trying to use this app to win.

attributes.title: My phone will not work now!🤧
attributes.review: After downloading this horrible app, I later tried to download a Kanye song and it kept crashing and my phone would shut down during my work calls. I am also very disappointed to find out that the wall is not even close to being done. In 2016 I waisted a vote that could have made this country good. I’m settling for joe this year smh. I’m disappointed Donny😭!!

attributes.title: 💕Yeah💓🧚 😊no🧚💓😊
attributes.review: This app took so long to download in the first place and kept glitching out every time I tried to go on to see pics of my fav obese president. Anywho once I got on the app to see if he was in my area, it said he was located underground in a bunker of some sort?? Weird. I wouldn’t give this app the time of day. It’s has a whole group of idiots meeting together to plan trump rallies. It’s bad for our kids!!! Zero stars for so many reasons🧚🤬✨

attributes.title: former republican
attributes.review:
as a former republican, I am absolutely disgusted with where we have ended up. I downloaded this to get a better idea of why trump feels he is a good president - and was met with vietnam era-style propaganda. I never thought I would witness something like this in real time: the fall of a nation. especially not my own. 

it is absolutely shameful that this app is allowed to be on the apple store given how incredibly dangerous and tyrannical so clearly is.

attributes.title: Phone got a virus
attributes.review: My phone got a virus, and of my information almost got lost. My bank account was hacked. This happened to two of my other friends. I think it’s something wrong with the app. My friends and colleagues have said that they’ve gotten this same problem. One of my friends almost ended up homeless because someone was purchasing things from his bank account.

attributes.title: worst public bathroom
attributes.review: i traveled to new york city with my family this spring, and i was absolutely horrified to see this monstrosity of a bathroom. Not only did it have a horrible stench, but it was uncomfortable and filthy. if i could put it at 0 stars, i would. i will never EVER go to this again, nor would i recommend it in anyway. i wouldn’t go anywhere in a mile radius of this building, and i tell you not too as well.

attributes.title: well this was disappointing
attributes.review: I downloaded this app out of appreciation for our lord and savior donald j trump. However after downloading the app i quickly realized that it stole my brain, like when i checked the next morning it was completely missing. This is honestly disrespectful to me, and an invasion of my rights as an American. This alone will have me not only sacrifice my first born child to satan, but i will also be voting for Biden now.

attributes.title: Stop✨🧚🏻🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻✨🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻✨😔✨ never again
attributes.review: Horrible horrifying absolutely rubbish would never download again one star review hate the man hate everything about it absolutely horrifying useless next to my bird and he died never again deleted one star review I don’t care such a loser move him never never ever catch me talking good about this man never never done this absolutely horrifying no point of this the reason is none.

attributes.title: ok boomer
attributes.review: So I was trying to support our lovely president ✨ so I downloaded and as I waited I put music particularly Monsta X and as I was waiting my phone paused the music and a much of racist slurs started to overload my phone ✨👄✨the next thing I know I was in the app and Trump was saying words that not even my mom could let me say .I really don’t recommend it. If a kid listen to this you would be disgusted to what they would learn....Anyways Stream STAY GOLD ✨✨✨🌝

attributes.title: Ugh.
attributes.review: I opened this app thinking it was be incredible 🥵 but when I opened it I felt I giant thud next to my bed! The thud happened to be a deer in the shape of joe Biden next to me! He said “don’t do it!” I DIDNT know what He meant but he sounded pretty logical being a deer, more logical than trump seemed to be 😌 I deleted the app immediately after I realized what this deer meant by the phrase “don’t do it” so I was appalled that this app sent me a deer and put it in my bedroom!!! What kinda voodoo is this cult on?
